Statement.Text: I’m glad you’re here! What are the chances we are going to the same school after all this time? I can't wait to show you around!
But isn’t it kind of strange you transferred to an all-boys academy six days before summer break?

TopResponseStatement.Text: I wanted to have at least one friend when starting at a new school.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: I didn’t realize this was an all-boys school...

Statement.Text: Some of us were thinking of going to the beach over summer break. I’m sure it would be way more fun with an actual girl along.
You should try to get one of the guys to go with you, or try to get them all! The more the merrier!

TopResponseStatement.Text: Uhh...sure?

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Shirtless guys on the beach? Sign me up!

Statement.Text: Guys are here are so hot, and all have unique personalities that make them super attractive. So many choices for you to choose from!
The boys here don’t know how to talk to girls, so you’ll have to be the one to ask them on dates...

TopResponseStatement.Text: Would it be weird if I dated multiple guys?

BottomResponseStatement.Text: But guys have cooties...

Statement.Text: Hopefully none of the guys are a yandere type. That’s the type of guy that will hurt their competition in order to get close to the girl they love.
I better be careful since we are so close, I don’t want to be targeted!

TopResponseStatement.Text: Wait...Sid...is there or is there not a yandere?!

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Seven guys in class, one has to be a yandere.

Statement.Text: Normally after you talk to three people school will be ending. That’s usually the time that I ask someone out on a date.
I’m off to eat chicken fried rice...mmmm chicken fried rice. See you tomorrow!

TopResponseStatement.Text: See you tomorrow Sid!

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Byeeeee!

Statement.Text: Awhhhhhh! You’re sooooooo Kawaii! The name’s Jerrick!
As my new best friend you should know that I lovveeeee puppies because they’re soo Kawaiii!

TopResponseStatement.Text: We will be BFFs for life!

BottomResponseStatement.Text: How old are you? Are you even allowed to be here?

Statement.Text: Grossss... I hate vegetables! Maybe Alex will share his apples with me... if I ask nicely!

TopResponseStatement.Text: Yummy! I love apples!

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Eat your vegetables, they help you grow up strong!

Statement.Text: I’m...Alex. I like to draw...but I’m not very good...

TopResponseStatement.Text: How old are the guys here? Like, seriously.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: I would love to see your drawings sometime!

Statement.Text: Adnan and Charley are getting sushi together and asked if anyone wanted to go... they’re so loud and always yelling at each other...
Sushi isn’t really my thing anyway... But you should go.

TopResponseStatement.Text: Something must be going on between Charley and Adnan.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: I'd rather stay and talk to you.

Statement.Text: I hate playing video games with Charley. He’s nice to everyone but me.
No one can even understand his stupid French accent anyway.

TopResponseStatement.Text: I think his French accent is sexy.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Git gud, scrub.

Statement.Text: Charley is such a scrublord. He should go back to France and eat his stupid cheese by himself...
Well..it...I...it's not like I would want to eat cheese with him or anything...

TopResponseStatement.Text: Adnan and Charley sitting in a tree!

BottomResponseStatement.Text: What caused you to be so salty all the time?

Statement.Text: What do you want? Ohhh you’re the new student. Not sure why they let you in.
I’m Adnan, and I’m the best at everything. Swimming. Piano. Reading. So don’t get in my way.

TopResponseStatement.Text: Adnan. That’s a dumb name.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Boring. I think I'll talk to the cute French guy over there.

Statement.Text: I am so photogenic, unlike Adnan. I mean have you seen his headshots? Horrible.
Come, mon amour! Take a photo with me. Let us show the world our beautiful love for each other!

TopResponseStatement.Text: Sid wasn't lying when he said guys were bad at talking to girls here.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Say cheese!

Statement.Text: Adnan always refuses to play shirtless ping-pong with me.
That’s how French people play ping-pong, he should respect my culture.

TopResponseStatement.Text: Next time you play, let me know so I can watch.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Your culture is weird...

Statement.Text: Oh, beautiful. Perfection. You must go on a date with me! My name? Charley, I’m French by the way.

TopResponseStatement.Text: Is it true French people are good kissers?

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Stranger danger!

Statement.Text: You must be hungry! I know this perfect little sushi restaurant.
And afterwards, we can go back to my place for dessert. I have some French cheese and chocolate you must taste.

TopResponseStatement.Text: I have mace.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: I'm sorry I missed that, did you say you were French?

Statement.Text: Yunhao. Drawing and photography is my calling.

TopResponseStatement.Text: That was abrupt.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: ...Hey.

Statement.Text: Cats are evil. Don’t ask why...

TopResponseStatement.Text: Why?

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Sure.

Statement.Text: As a king I must be a well-rounded to accommodate my subjects.
I swim to stay fit and I read to keep my mind sharp. It is all part of my duties as king.

TopResponseStatement.Text: Seriously, what are you the king of?

BottomResponseStatement.Text: You are an inspiration for your subjects!

Statement.Text: No other boy here compares to me. They are all but lowly subjects, under my reign.

TopResponseStatement.Text: So right you are, my King!

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Well, I have always wanted to date a ginger.

Statement.Text: King Louis, my lady. What a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

TopResponseStatement.Text: King of what?

BottomResponseStatement.Text: My pleasure to meet such a dignified individual.

Statement.Text: I enjoy many leisure activities such as piano and ping-pong. Please, feel free to talk to me anytime.

TopResponseStatement.Text: Maybe I can partake in converstaion with you sometime soon.

BottomResponseStatement.Text: Thanks, yeah. I'll keep that in mind.
